full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify - Construction Services

#### Tender Information
#### GSIN | UNSPSC
* GSIN: None
* UNSPSC: *72120000 | Nonresidential building construction services

#### Tender Description
[Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)] and [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)] are inviting eligible and prequalified Suppliers to participate in an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) to deliver Construction Services for high-security federal entities. This ITQ is initiated as a two-phase procurement approach:

1.  Phase 1 (ITQ) - Invitation to Qualify
2.  Phase 2 (RFSA) - Request for Supply Arrangement

Only eligible Suppliers who meet all mandatory requirements will be invited to participate in Phase 2.

#### Auction Details | RFP Details

*   **Reference Number**: WS4085724990 - Doc4141468037
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Publication Date**: 10 August 2023
*   **Closing Date**: 6 September 2023 14:00 EST
*   **Region of Delivery**: The National Capital Region (NCR)

#### How to Respond

To respond, interested Suppliers should:

1.  Register on Ariba Discovery
2.  Confirm their contact information is up-to-date
3.  Finalize and submit their bids electronically on Ariba Discovery

Only responses submitted electronically by or on 6 September 2023 14:00 EST will be accepted. Suppliers should note that failure to meet the submission deadline may result in their bid being declared non-responsive.

#### Access to Documents

For further information, please visit [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17133824?extsite=MTcxMzM4MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Contact Information

*   **Name**: Jessica Kelly (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email**: jessica.kelly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: None
*   **Fax**: None

Note that [Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)] is not accountable for any technical technical trouble or problems which may occur in accessing documents. Any responses should be directed electronically to be eligible.   It is recommended to review the full ITQ documentation thoroughly prior to responding to the invitation. For any inquires
